--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <warriorazure@...> wrote:
>
> OOC: Azureblade was actually trying to cut the Minion other than
> Animus, the one circling in the air.
   
  OOC: Ahhh, sorry I misread, here is an adjusted post:
   
  BIC:
   
  The winged minion was almost caught off gaurd with Azureblade's attack, he had been so gloating over the rocket attack as it came from Animus, and had been disappointed in its lack of success. It was only at the last moment that he reacts to the enemies sword attack, turning what could have been a wing severing blow into just a brutally damaging one. With a scream of defiance the minion leaps higher into the air, fortunatly for him it was booster rockets and not the wings that kept him aloft as his wing was bent at an odd angle. With a flex it straightens somewhat, but there is a definite dent. With a roar twin rockets fly from the fleeing Minion, they pause for a moment in the air as the moons small gravity holds them, and then flare as they leap at Azureblade!
   
  Animus leaps into the skies also with an almost eager smile smile on his face. With a deft move he orients on Azureblade again as he waits for the rockets to complete thier attack and he can chime in behind them! 
   
  Preston
(Animus)
